eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\delta A_{\mu}{}^{B} &=& {\cal D}_{\mu}{}^{BC}\lambda^{C} \equiv  
(\delta^{BC}\partial_{\mu}+\epsilon^{BCD}A_{\mu}{}^{D})\lambda^{C} \,, 
\nonumber \\
\delta\phi^{i} &=& -\lambda^{B}K^{Bi}(\phi) \,, 
\label{3} 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} A_{\mu}{}^{B} &=& {\cal D}_{\mu}{}^{BC}c^{C} \,, \qquad
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} \phi^{i} =-c^{B}K^{Bi}(\phi) \,, 
\nonumber \\ 
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} c^{B} &=& {1\over2}\epsilon^{BCD} c^{C}c^{D} \,, 
\label{8}
\\ 
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} \bar{c}^{B} &=& ib^{B} \,, \qquad \qquad
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} b^{B} = 0 
\nonumber 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
W' &=& \ln \int {\frak D}{\cal M'} \exp \! \left[\, \int d^{4}x 
({\cal L}_{\rm YM}+\widetilde{\cal L}_{\phi_{0}}+{\cal L}_{\rm GF}) 
\right] 
\nonumber \\ 
(&\approx& W+\ln N_{0}\,) 
\label{12}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
W'' &=& \ln \int {\frak D}{\cal M}'' \exp \! \left[\, \int d^{4}x 
({\cal L}_{1}+{\cal L}_{\rm GF}) \right] 
\label{17}
\\
(&=& W'- \ln N_{1}\,) \,,
\nonumber 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal L}_{\rm GF} &=& {i\over{g_{0}^{2}}} \,
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$}  \bigg[ \widetilde{D}^{\mu BC} \bar{\gamma}^{C} \!\cdot
( \widetilde{A}_{\mu}{}^{B}-\tilde{e}_{\mu}{}^{B} ) 
\nonumber \\ 
& &
-{\alpha_{0}\over2}\,\bar{\gamma}^{B} \beta^{B} \bigg] \,,
%
\label{18}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} \widetilde{A}_{\mu}{}^{b}
&=& -\epsilon^{bc3}\widetilde{A}_{\mu}{}^{c} \tilde{c} \,,
\qquad 
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} \widetilde{A}_{\mu}{}^{3}
=\partial_{\mu}\tilde{c} \,, 
\nonumber \\ 
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} \tilde{e}_{\mu}{}^{B} &=& 
-\widetilde{\nabla}_{\mu}{}^{BC}(\gamma^{C}-\delta^{C3}\tilde{c}) \,, 
\nonumber \\ 
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} \gamma^{B} &=& 
-{1\over2}\epsilon^{BCD} \gamma^{C} \gamma^{D} 
+\epsilon^{BC3} \gamma^{C} \tilde{c} \,, 
\\ 
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} \bar{\gamma}^{B} &=& i\beta^{B} 
-\epsilon^{BCD} \bar{\gamma}^{C} (\gamma^{D}-\delta^{D3} \tilde{c}) \,, 
\nonumber \\ 
\mbox{\boldmath $\delta$} \beta^{B} &=& 
\epsilon^{BCD} \beta^{C} (\gamma^{D}-\delta^{D3} \tilde{c}) \,,
\nonumber \label{19}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
Z_{a} &\equiv& {1\over N_{6}} \exp \! \left[\, \int d^{4}x 
{\cal L}_{a}^{(1)} |
\raisebox{-0.57ex}{\mbox{\scriptsize{$a_{\mu}= 
\frac{g_{0}^{2}}{\rho_{3}} \frac{\delta}{\delta j^{\mu}}$ }}} 
\right] 
\nonumber \\ 
&& \times \exp \! \left[\, \int d^{4}x 
\bigg( -{1\over2} j_{\mu}
\frac{(\rho_{3}/g_{0})^{2}}{\rho_{1}\square
+g_{0}^{2}{\mit \Lambda}^{2}/16\pi^{2}} \,
j^{\mu} \bigg) \right] \,.   
\label{48}
\
